loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy buy palm-oil, onions, margi, salt, pepper, tomatoes, etc. from wholesalers to add to her business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy palm-oil, onions, margi, salt, pepper, fish, tomatoes, etc. to add to her current stock.

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn is a married woman and a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 32 years old and has four children who are in school. She has a business of raising livestock in the Philippines. Analyn has been in this business for 3 years.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. She requested a PHP 22,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy vitamins and other supplies for her livestock.

 In the future, Analyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and other supplies for her livestock.

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty is 45 years old and married with six children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

She has borrowed and paid off 6 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from food vending and buying and selling dried fish.

Betty aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is 51 years old, and is married with three children, two of whom are currently in school.

Emma has an agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She has been pig fattening for one year now, and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business activities. She has now requested a loan of PHP 10,500 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

In the future, Emma would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Federica

texts.en:
Federica is 38 years old and is married with two children. She earns a living by raising livestock in the Philippines. She has been raising livestock for six years and also earns additional income from making native mats.

Federica successfully repaid her previous loan, and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. She is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to purchase additional livestock, feed, vitamins and other supplies for her business.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock, feed, vitamins and other supplies for her business.

loans.name: Juvy

texts.en:
Juvy is single and has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years now.

Juvy has requested a loan of PHP 11,000 through NWTF to buy more items like bread, soft-drinks, beer, canned goods, eggs, sugar, etc. to sell.

In the future, Juvy would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items like bread, soft-drinks, beer, canned goods, eggs, sugar, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en:
Luzviminda is 58 years old, and is married with two children who are in school.

Luzviminda is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She has been raising livestock for ten years now, and has borrowed nine times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business activities. Luzviminda has now requested a loan of PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy vitamins and other supplies for her livestock.

In the future, Luzviminda would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and other supplies for her livestock.

loans.name: Arafi-Ou Group

texts.fr:
Mme ROUKYATA est responsable du groupe ARAFI-OU. Mariée, elle est mère de 04enfants. Le plus âgé a 12ans et le moins âgé a 02ans. 02 vont aà l’école.
Mme vend des céréales depuis 07ans. Elle s’approvisionne à Léo.
Elle veut s’acheter 05sacs de maïs et 05sacs de mil.
Elle épargne ses bénéfices pour renforcer son activité. Mme ambitionne agrandir son commerce et améliorer ses conditions de vie.
texts.en:
Mrs. Roukyata is the leader of gourp Arafi-Ou. She is married and a mother of four. Her oldest is twelve and her youngest is two. Two of the children attend school.

She has been selling cereals for seven years. She procures her products in Léo.

She wants to purchase five bags of corn and five bags of millet.

She is saving her profits to strengthen her business. Her ambition is to grow her operation and to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy five bags of corn and five of millet.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more door locks, hinges, nails, and door-handles for her business

loans.name: Pidison

texts.en:
Pidison is age 28, single, and a resident of Nsumbi zone, a suburb in Nansana. Pidison looks after his brothers in the village for whom he pays school fees.

Pidison has a business of rentals in Nansana. He constructed these houses from savings he got from his salary as an enforcement officer in KCCA. He approached Ugafode for a loan to renovate his houses.

According to Pidison’s tenants, he is one of the best landlords one would wish to stay with. He thanks the Kiva lenders for partnering with him.

Pictured is Pidison with the UGAFODE credit officer (left to right).

loans.use: To renovate his rental houses.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is an agriculturalist who specializes in coffee and has coffee plantations in Kigenya Kasaali. He works for six days a week on his farm and six hours day.

He also has a stationary shop in Kyotera town and a piggery project which enables him to earn extra income. He was motivated to start a piggery project by the desire to get income and also exercise his rearing skills.

Joseph supplies his goods to traders around Kyotera and Kampala and hopes to use the loan to maintain his coffee plantation and his piggery project.
He faces a challenge of transporting his goods from Kigenya to trading centers since transport fares are high because the road network is poor. He is described as a hard working man.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: María es una mujer de 51 años de edad, llena de entusiasmo y espíritu emprendedor quien se dedica a la comercialización de productos de primera necesidad como: arroz, frijoles, huevos, golosinas, especias, etc. Tiene dos años de contar con esta pequeña tienda la cual le permite colaborar con las gastos del hogar y junto a su esposo se ganan la vida y mantienen la economía del hogar. María desea invertir en su negocio dado que para ella y su familia es muy importante esta fuente de ingresos ya que con lo percibe su esposo de su trabajo no logran cubrir los gastos del hogar. Por lo anterior ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de productos de tienda como: cereales, golosinas, detergentes, especias, etc. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento dado que no posee los recursos económicos necesarios para hacer el desembolso pero si la capacidad de pago mensual que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
María is a 51-year-old women, full of enthusiasm and entrepreneurial spirit, who works selling basic foodstuffs such as rice, beans, eggs, sweets, spices etc. She has had this small shop for two years, which has allowed her to contribute to the household expenses, and she and her husband make a living and maintain their household costs. María hopes to invest in her business, given that for her and her family this is a very important source of income, as they cannot cover the household costs with what her husband earns alone.

For this reason she has decided to apply for this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of products for the shop such as cereals, sweets, detergents, spices etc. She hopes to be able to rely on this funding as she does not have the necessary economic resources for this expense; however she is capable of the monthly payments that the loan implies.

loans.use: to buy cereals, sweets, detergents, spices etc. for her business.

loans.name: Rebeca Abigail

texts.es: Rebeca tiene 22 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su pequeña hija de un año de edad. Rebeca se dedica a la venta de refrescos y antojitos típicos como: yuca frita, empanadas, nuegados, etc. Es así como se gana la vida honradamente y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Rebeca ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la su negocio en la compra de los insumos necesarios como: yuca, plátanos, azúcar, aceite, leche, frijoles, etc. Su negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos por lo que es muy importante poder inyectarle capital para aumentar la oferta de sus productos que le permitan aumentar sus ventas como sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Rebeca is 22 years old and lives in her own house with her little one-year-old daughter. Rebeca works selling soft drinks and typical snacks such as: fried cassava, pies, nuegados (fried dumplings) etc. In this way she earns an honest living and supports her household. 

Rebeca has decided to apply for this loan from FUSAI to invest in her business by buying necessary supplies such as cassava, bananas, sugar, oil, milk, beans etc. Her business is her main source of income which is why it is very important to be able to inject capital into it in order to increase the products on offer, which will enable her to increase her sales and her income.

loans.use: to buy cassava, bananas, sugar, oil, milk, beans etc. for her business.

loans.name: Marvin Jose

texts.es:
Marvin José de 51 años de edad, soltero con tres hijos, de edad, es originario del Sauce, lugar que está ubicado en la zona norte de la región. se caracteriza por ser trabajador, responsable, con ganas de superación personal. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo cursar una carrera y se vio obligada a trabajar desde temprana edad. en la actualidad sigue luchando, pará brindarle un futuro mejor a sus hijos, y lograr sus sueños como es ver formado a sus hijos en profesionales.
Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad económica una farmacia, el dedica a su negocio unas 12 horas diarias ofreciendo sus productos médicos como: novalgina, acetaminofen, corilin, talerdin, gliblenclamida, losartan, suero oral, panadol, mebendasol.  El negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación.   El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio  en la compra y venta de productos médicos, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos.  Marvin agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a persona de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Marvin José is 51 years old, and he is single with three children. He is a native of El Sauce, which is located within the region’s northern zone. 

He is characterized by being hardworking and responsible, and by his desire for personal achievement. Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources, he was not able to study for a degree, and he had to go to work at a very early age. He continues striving to give his children a better future, and to achieve his dream of seeing them become professionals.

He has a pharmacy, thanks to his hard work and commitment to moving forward, and it is his livelihood. He works about 12 hours daily, providing medical products such as Novalgin, acetaminophen, corilin, talerdin, glibenclamide, losartan, oral rehydration solution, Panadol, and mebendazole.  His business is located in his house. 

The purpose of the loan is to invest in working capital and to stock his business, buying and selling medical products, so that soon he can earn more income. Marvin appreciates the help that the Kiva lenders give to people with scant resources, and to poor countries like Nicaragua so that they might have a decent working environment.

loans.use: to invest in working capital, and to stock his pharmacy with medical products such as Novalgin, acetaminophen, corilin, talerdin, glibenclamide, losartan, oral rehydration solution, Panadol, and mebendazole.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio continua dedicándose a brindar el servicio de taxi, el socio lleva buen tiempo realizando su trabajo el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, él socio trabaja todos los días transportando a sus pasajeros a los distintos lugres que le solicitan, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de llantas para su carro.
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member continues to make a living by providing a taxi service. He has been doing his job for a long time and it is going well thanks to the effort he puts into his business each day. He works every day transporting his passengers to the different places that they request. He wants to be able to carry on working in order to continue supporting his family. He is requesting this loan to purchase tyres for his car. The member is happy to be receiving his loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase tyres for his car.

loans.name: 18 Thắng Hùng Hải Lộc Group

texts.en:
Tám operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. She is requesting a loan to purchase fish to resell.	Tám has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Tám is 42 years old, married, and has 3 children.
	
Tám is the group leader of the 18 Thắng Hùng Hải Lộc solidarity group, which consists of 3 members. 	

In 2010, Tám joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Tám has successfully repaid 5 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.	

One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her are natural disasters and droughts.	

With her business profit, Tám hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase fish to resell

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
Marina works hard to support her family. Marina is married and has a business raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years now. 

Marina has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

In the future, Marina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann is widowed, and she works hard to support her family. She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and has been in this business for 22 years now.

Mary Ann requested a loan of PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials for her fishing business.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials for her fishing business.

loans.name: Nancita

texts.en:
Nancita is 50 years old, married, and has five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Nancita has a business selling native bags and mats in the Philippines. Nancita requested a 22,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to purchase more native mats and bags to sell.

Nancita has been in this business for 30 years. Nancita would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more native mats and bags to sell

loans.name: Luciana

texts.en:
Luciana is 43 years old, married, and has eight children. Four of the eight children are currently in school.

Luciana is in the agricultural business, farming calamansi in the Philippines. Luciana requested a 13,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Luciana has been farming calamansi for 10 years now, and has borrowed 12 times in the past from NWTF to sustain the business.

In the future, Luciana would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Susana is 47 years old, married, and has three children; two children are currently in school.

Susana is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Susana requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Susana has been in pig fattening for 3 years now, and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain the business.

In the future, Susana would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Belinda

texts.en:
Belinda is 34 years old, married, and has three children. Two of the children are currently in school.  Belinda works very hard to provide for them.

Belinda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional groceries like snack foods, soft-drinks, canned goods, shampoo, detergent, etc., to sell.

Belinda has been in this business for 3 years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, soft-drinks, canned goods, shampoo, detergent, etc. 

In the future, Belinda would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries like snack foods, soft-drinks, canned goods, shampoo, detergent, etc., to sell

loans.name: Bonifacia

texts.en:
Bonifacia works hard to support her family. Bonifacia is married and has a vegetable vending business in the Philippines.

Bonifacia requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more vegetables to sell to her customers.

Bonifacia has been in this business for 6 years now.

Bonifacia would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell to her customers

loans.name: Glenda

texts.en:
Glenda is 47 years old, married, and has four children. Two of the children are currently in school.  Glenda works very hard to provide for them.

Glenda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell in her general store.

Glenda has been in this business for 3 years, and sells a variety of items such as shampoo, coffee, snack foods, cereals, bread, sugar, etc. 

Glenda would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Jenelyn

texts.en:
Jenelyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling firewood in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 11,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more firewood to sell in her business.

Jenelyn has been in this business for 4 years. Jenelyn earns additional income from a general store.

Jenelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more firewood to sell

loans.name: Lordelyn

texts.en:
Lordelyn is 36 years old, married, and has three children.

Lordelyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 29,500 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

Lordelyn has borrowed and paid 13 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Lordelyn aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Soedirman

texts.en:
Soedirman thanks all Kiva lenders for helping him to realize his long terms goals.

He has repaid his loan to Kiva lenders on time and was able to save some money for the purchase of his own plots. Soedirman was also able to expand his rice areas with the profits from this loan. 
 
He is approaching Seva MFI and Kiva lenders for another loan of SRD 7,500 to purchase fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 28 years old and married with one child, who is currently in school. Marilyn works very hard to provide for her family. Marilyn runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, salt, coffee, detergent, and juice. 

Marilyn has requested a 14,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional items like sugar, salt, coffee, detergent, and juice to sell. In the future, Marilyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional items like sugar, salt, coffee, detergent,  and juice to sell

loans.name: Thơ

texts.en:
Mrs. Thơ works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She is 42 years old and is married, with two children. She supports her two dependents with her business in Nong Cong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Thơ has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Thơ faces in her life is not having a hygeinic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet and bathroom. This is Thơ's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

In the future, Thơ hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet

loans.name: Luân

texts.en:
Luân works in agriculture farming poultry and cattle.  Luân has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Luân is 33 years old, married, and has 3 children. Luân lives in the Nong Cong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Luân's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns him is not having a hygenic latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet and a bathroom.

With his business profits, Luân hopes to make enough money to provide for his family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: buy sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet and a bathroom

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en:
Luzviminda, 46, is married and has six children. Three of the six children are currently in school.  She is a very hard working entrepreneur. .

Luzviminda has a business selling eggs in the Philippines. Luzviminda requested a 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more trays of eggs to sell.

Luzviminda has been in this business for 6 years. In the future, Luzviminda would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more trays of eggs to sell

loans.name: Victoria Del Portete (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Victoria del Portete está formado por 6 socias y 2 socios, quienes laboran en diferentes actividades como es la agricultura o el comercio, las cuales les permiten tener su dependencia económica y así  aportar a la economía de su hogar, son personas amables, gentiles, carismáticas y aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos. Viven por la parroquia de Victoria del Portete en Cuenca, este lugar es de clima frió, cuenta con grandes llanuras propicias para la ganadería, existen varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de animales y muchos laboran en la ciudad ejerciendo diferentes plazas de trabajo.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Gloria,  le gusta este grupo por la unión, compañerismo y solidaridad de todas las socias.
La Señora Gloria tiene 38 años de edad, está casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 19 y 8 años, su primera hija se encuentra en el colegio y su segunda hija está en una escuelita de la ciudad, su esposo labora en la construcción, no tienen casa propia por lo que vive en casa de un familiar.
Doña Gloria se dedica a la agricultura, sus cosechas son para la venta y para el consumo de su casa, también cría cuyes, gallinas y ganado.
 El dinero de su crédito va a invertir en la compra de gallinas, cuyes y  alimento de animales. Su meta es tener una tienda en su casa.
texts.en:
The Victoria del Portete communal bank has six female members and two male members who are involved in different activities like farming and commerce. The activities allow them to have economic independence and contribute to their household incomes. They are friendly, kind and charismatic people yet they still maintain the culture and traditions of their people. They live in the  Victoria del Portete parish in Cuenca. This place has a cold climate. It has 
great grasslands for livestock. There are various places to enjoy nature.  The people are dedicated to commerce, raising animals and many of them work in the city in various types of jobs. 
One of the members is Gloria. She likes the group for the bonds, the friendship and solidarity among all the members. Gloria is 38 years old. She is married and she has two children from the relationship who are 19 and 18 years old. Her first daughter is in school and her second daughter is in a small school in the city. Her husband works in construction. They do not have her own house so they live in a relative's house. 
Gloria is involved in farming. Her harvests are for selling and consumption in her home. She also raises guinea pigs, chickens and livestock. 
The money from the loan will be invested in the purchase of chickens and animal feed. Her goal is to have a store in her house.

loans.use: purchase chickens, guinea pigs and animal feed.

loans.name: Aseel

texts.en: Aseel is a 24-year-old married lady living in a sector in Jordan called Irbid with her husband. She is a university student majoring in Physics. And she is in her fourth year. She is planning to work in her study field after graduation in order to start helping her husband financially. But her husband is currently facing a financial crisis, which is not allowing him to pay for her upcoming semester fees. Because of that, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more oranges and coconuts for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to assist her with the maintenance of her coffee crops.

loans.name: Sherly

texts.en:
Sherly is 38 years old, married, and has two children who are in school.  

Sherly is in the agricultural business, raising chickens in the Philippines. Sherly requested a 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies for her chickens.

Sherly has been raising chickens for 4 years now, and has borrowed 6 times in the past from NWTF to sustain the business.  

Sherly would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and other supplies for her chickens

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To acquire thermally-efficient cooking energy from liquefied petroleum gas

loans.name: Washington

texts.es:
El socio continua dedicándose a su negocio de restaurant, él socio lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñosa ,el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicito el crédito para la compra de insumos como arroz, aceité entre otros.
El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This communal bank member continues working in his restaurant business. He has worked for quite some time in this business, which is going well for him thanks to the effort that he puts into it every day. He is a responsible and committed person. He wants to be able to continue working in this way to continue supporting his family.

He is applying for the loan to purchase supplies such as rice and oil, among other items.

He feels grateful for the loan granted to him, and he promises to make his payments.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as rice and oil, among other items

loans.name: Lý

texts.en:
Lý works in agriculture farming poultry and cattle.  Lý has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Lý is 46 years old, married, and has 4 children. Lý supports 4 dependents with her business in the Nong Cong district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Lý's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

The main hardship that Lý faces in her life is not having a hygenic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet and a bathroom.

In the future, Lý hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to build a new house, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet and a bathroom.

loans.name: Loan

texts.en:
Loan works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle.  Loan has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Loan is 43 years old, married, and has three children.  Loan supports 3 dependents with her business in the Nong Cong district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Loan's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

The main hardship that Loan faces in her life is not having a hygenic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet and a bathroom.

In the future, Loan hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to build a new house, and to maintain  a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet and a bathroom

loans.name: Minh

texts.en:
Minh works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle.  Minh has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Minh is 32 years old, married, and has 2 children.  Minh lives with 3 dependents in Nong Cong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Minh's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having hygenic latrine.  She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet and a bathroom.

With her business profits, Minh hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to build a new house, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet and a bathroom

loans.name: Charlyn

texts.en:
Charlyn is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Charlyn is 27 years old and has two children currently in school.

Charlyn has a abaca (fiber from abaca palm leaf) weaving business in the Philippines. Charlyn requested a PHP 19,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional materials, such as abaca fiber, etc. for her business.

Charlyn has been in this business for seven years. In the future, Charlyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials, such as abaca fiber, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Enelita

texts.en:

Enelita requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials and gears for her fishing business.

Enelita has been in this business for 20 years now.

Enelita would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials and gears for her fishing business

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
Marlyn is 26 years old and married with two children. Marlyn works very hard to provide for them.

Marlyn runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to resell in her general store.

Marlyn has been in this business for three years, and sells a variety of items, such as rice, snack foods, soft-drinks, beers, laundry soap, milk, etc. 

In the future, Marlyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to resell in her general store.

loans.name: Sabelita

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Sabelita works hard to support her family.

She has a firewood vending business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from a general store. Sabelita is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF to buy more firewood to resell to her customers in her firewood vending business.

Sabelita has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more firewood to resell to her customers.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Elizabeth is 50 years old and has two children who are still in school.

Elizabeth has a sewing business in the Philippines. Elizabeth requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional materials, such as threads, buttons, fabric, etc. for her sewing business.

Elizabeth has been in this business for seven years. In the future, Elizabeth would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials, such as threads, buttons, fabric, etc. for her sewing business.

loans.name: Wenceslao

texts.es:
Wenceslao, es una persona de 84 años de edad, se dedica a la agricultura y Caficultura, se creció con sus abuelos que se dedicaban a la caficultura ellos trabajaron y dedicaron toda su vida a realizar esta actividad.
De esta manera el señor Wenceslao adquirió conocimiento y experiencia de sus abuelos quienes le inculcaron buenos valores y principios que son los que lo han llevado a continuar desempeñando esta actividad que por años se ha convertido en su principal fuente de ingresos la que le ha servido para llevar el sustento diario a su familia y de esta forma pudo sacar adelante a sus hijos y les pudo dar todo lo necesario, ahora ellos son unas personas de bien y de trabajo que de todas las maneras ayudan a su papá.


Él tiene una experiencia de 60 años realizando trabajos en la caficultura, a la que se ha dedicado toda la vida  ya que se ha convertido en su principal fuente de ingresos, actividad que aprendió de sus abuelos quienes se sentían orgullosos de cultivar la tierra día a día, y él era quien los acompañaba todos los días a la finca llevando una Cuma, un azadón y una calabaza con agua siendo estos sus implementos de trabajo.
El decidió dedicarse a este trabajo motivado por sus abuelos, y porque fue una herencia que le dejaron sus abuelos, y que hoy en día quiere dejar a uno de sus nietos a quien ha crecido y ha educado con mucho amor y disciplina y es quien le ayuda en las tareas de la caficultura.

El dinero será utilizado para comprar semilla mejorada de café,  ya que tiene una parcela donde hará un camillero, para posteriormente trasplantarlas al terreno donde será cultivado el café. 
De esta manera dará vida  a nuevas parcelas de cafetal que se han convertido en el patrimonio de su familia.
texts.en:
Wenceslao is 84 years of age. He works in agriculture and raising coffee. He grew up with his grandparents, who grew coffee. They worked and dedicated all their lives to doing this work.

In this way, Señor Wenceslao acquired knowledge and experience from his grandparents, who taught him good values and principles, which are those that he has continued, working in this activity that over the years has become his principal source of income and which has served to bring the daily sustenance to his family. In this way he was able to raise his children and give them everything necessary. Now they are good, working people who help their father.

He has 60 years of experience doing the work of coffee growing, to which he has dedicated all his life, since it has become his principal source of income. It is work he learned from his grandparents, who felt proud to cultivate the land day after day,. He was the one who accompanied them every day to the plantation, carrying a machete, a hoe, and a gourd with water, these being his work tools.

He decided to do this work, motivated by his grandparents and because it was an inheritance that his grandparents left him, and which today he wants to leave to one of his grandchildren, whom he has raised and educated with much love and discipline and is the one who helps him with the coffee-growing chores.

The money will be used to buy improved coffee seeds, since he has a parcel of land where there will be a road, so that he can later transplant them to land that will be planted in coffee.

In this way he will give life to new parcels of the coffee plantation, which has become the patrimony of his family.

loans.use: to buy improved seed for coffee

loans.name: Jose Adular

texts.es: José tiene 50 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y su hija de 17 años de edad. José se dedica a la compra y venta de granos básicos como: maíz, arroz,maicillo y frijoles. De esta forma junto a su esposa mantienen la economía del hogar y es así como poco a poco van saliendo adelante. José solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra mayor cantidad de granos básicos (maíz, frijoles, maicillo, arroz). para abarcar una mayor cuota de mercado que le permita aumentar sus ventas e ingresos con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en: José is 50 years old and lives in his own house along with his wife and 17-year-old daughter. José buys and sells basic foodstuffs such as corn, rice, sorghum, and beans. In this way, along with his wife, he maintains the economy of the household, and this is how, little by little, they are getting ahead. José is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of a greater quantity of basic foodstuffs (corn, beans, sorghum, and rice) in order to stock a greater quantity of merchandise, which will allow him to increase his sales and income, with the goal of improving his living conditions and those of his family.

loans.use: to buy basic foodstuffs (corn, beans, sorghum, and rice) for his business

loans.name: Nere

texts.en:
Nere is 31, married, and has three children who are in school.  She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Nere has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 5 years. 

Nere requested a 17,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her general store business.

In the future, Nere would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:

Rosalie runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 14,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more products like soft-drinks, snack foods, candies, biscuits, beers, noodles, cooking oil, etc., to sell.  Rosalie has been in this business for 7 years,   

Rosalie would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more products like soft-drinks, snack foods, candies, biscuits, beers, noodles, cooking oil, etc,. to sell

loans.name: Camila

texts.en:
Camila is 57 years old, married, and has two children; two of her children are currently in school.  Camila works very hard to provide for them.

Camila runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional items like canned goods, seasonings, soft-drinks, detergent, shampoo, hair conditioner, noodles, etc., to sell.  Camila has been in this business for 3 years.   

In the future, Camila would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items like canned goods, seasonings, soft-drinks, detergent, shampoo, hair conditioner, noodles, etc., to sell

loans.name: Ernalen

texts.en:

Ernalen is in the agricultural business, raising poultry in the Philippines. Ernalen requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional chickens, feed, and vitamins for her business.

Ernalen has been in the poultry business for 4 years now, and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain the business.

In the future, Ernalen would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional chickens, feed, and vitamins for her business

loans.name: Flordeliza

texts.en:
Flordeliza, 39, is married and has three children who are in school. 

Flordeliza has a general store business in the Philippines. Flordeliza requested a 10,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.  Flordeliza has been in this business for 5 years.  She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Flordeliza would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines. Lydia has been in this business for 30 years now.

She requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials like fishing nets for her fishing business. In the future, Lydia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like fishing nets for her fishing business

loans.name: Ma. Victoria

texts.en:
Ma. Victoria is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Ma. Victoria is 33 years old and has two children who are in school.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines. Ma. Victoria requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional materials for her fishing business.  Ma. Victoria has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her fishing business

loans.name: Gulsara

texts.ru: Гульсара 47 лет, вдова, мать 4 детей. У Гульсары - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав в 2005 году с 6,000 сом (KGS), благодаря целеустремленности и трудолюбию Гульсары, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 2 дойные коровы. Также имеется земельный надел, на котором она ежегодно выращивает хлопок. Дополнительно Гульсара реализует молоко. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Гульсара обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом для закупки семян хлопка и селитры для улучшения плодородности почвы. Гульсара намерена получить хороший урожай со своего участка, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита Гульсара планирует вложить в покупку овец.
texts.en: Gulsara is 47 years old, widow and a mother of 4 children.  Gulsara has a high school education. The main source of income for her family is her livestock and farming business, which she started in 2005 with an initial investment of 6,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to Gulsara's persistence and hard work, today she has two cows and a plot of land where she grows cotton.  In addition, Gulsara sells milk from her cows.  Her monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS).  In order to expand her business, Gulsara turned to the bank of Bai Tushum for a loan to purchase cotton seeds and fertilizer.  Gulsara is determined to obtain a great harvest this year and to increase her income.  Profits from her business, Gulsara is planning to use for purchasing of sheep.

loans.use: To buy cotton seeds

loans.name: Maria Merla

texts.en:
Maria Merla works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for six years now.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more materials for her business. Maria Merla would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more materials for her business

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Rosalie is 47 years old and has one child who is still in school.

She has a fruit vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more fruits to sell to her customers.

Rosalie has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more fruits to sell to her customers

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en:
Vivian is married and works hard to support her family. Vivian has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for 10 years now.

Vivian requested a 20,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials for her business.


In the future, Vivian would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials for her business

loans.name: Santos Alberto

texts.es:
Santos es una persona de 20 años de edad, muy responsable, respetuoso y trabajador, él se ha crecido con su madre que se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos de engorde en una granja propia.  

El joven ha realizado sus estudios hasta bachillerato en mecánica automotriz  y se ha dedicado a dicha actividad desde que se graduó y en la actualidad se ha convertido en su principal fuente de ingresos. Él se levanta a las 5 de la mañana y se dispone a salir con la motocicleta a su lugar de trabajo que está ubicado en el barrio que le queda a 5 km de su casa.  De esta forma, viaja de lunes a sábado a su lugar de trabajo y los fines de semana se dedica a trabajar en la granja de pollos con su mamá.

El joven se dedica a realizar trabajos de mecánica automotriz, como empleado en un taller tiene una experiencia de 5 años actividad que ha sido aprendida fruto de su empeño y el esfuerzo en realizar sus estudios, y los fines de semana se dedica a vender pollos lavados en su casa y a dejar pedidos en su motocicleta.


El dinero será utilizado en ampliación  y mejoramiento de las instalaciones de la granja donde crecen y se desarrollan los pollos y también será destinada en compra de más pollos, ya que de ahora en adelante él será quien administrara la granja,  de esta forma obtendrá un mejor ingreso económico y podrá ayudar en los gastos y en las necesidades de su hogar.


Las proyecciones que el joven tiene a futuro son las de pagar el crédito y adquirir otro para comprar un vehículo que le sirva para trasportar pollos a las tiendas y a los comedores con los que tiene contratos, hacer más grande las instalaciones que le permita tener gallinas ponedoras y con la buena inversión de las ganancias comenzara a montar su propio taller de mantenimiento preventivo y correctivo de vehículos.
texts.en:
Santos is 20 years old, very responsible, respectful, and hard-working. He grew up with his mother, who raised and sold chickens for fattening on her own farm.

This young man has completed his studies through the high school level in auto mechanics, and he has worked in this activity since he graduated. It has now become his principal source of income. He gets up at 5 in the morning and gets ready to leave by motorcycle for his workplace, which is located in a neighborhood 5 km from his home. He travels to his workplace in this way from Monday to Saturday, and on the weekends he works on the chicken farm with his mother.

He does auto mechanic's work as an employee in a shop. He has five years of experience in this work, which has been learned as a result of his effort and exertion in completing his studies. On the weekends, he sells cleaned chickens from his house and delivers orders on his motorcycle.

The money will be used to expand and improve the facilities of the farm where they raise chickens, and it will also be used to buy more chickens, since from now on he will be the one who manages the farm. In this way he will obtain better economic income and will be able to help with the expenses and the necessities of his household.

The projections that this young man has for the future are to pay off the loan and acquire another to buy a vehicle that will serve for transporting chickens to the stores and dining establishments with which he has contracts, to make bigger facilities that will allow him to have laying hens, and with the good investment of the earnings, he will begin to set up his own shop for preventive maintenance and repair of vehicles.

loans.use: to expand and improve the facilities of the farm where they raise chickens, and to buy more chickens

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for a clean cooking package of liquefied petroleum gas

loans.name: 23 Quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Lương operates a food stall/restaurant selling vegetables. She is requesting a loan to purchase vegetables to resell.  Lương has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Lương is 39 years old, married, and has 2 children.  Lương lives in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

Lương is the group leader of the 03.01.23 - Quảng Hưng solidarity group, which consists of 3 members. 

In 2013, Lương joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Lương has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Lương faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profits, Lương hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables to resell

loans.name: 16 Phú Sơn 2 Group

texts.en:
Dần has a business tailoring clothes. She is requesting a loan to purchase cloth to resell.  Dần has been involved in this business for more than 10 years

Dần is 51 years old, married and has 1 child.  She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

Dần is the group leader of the 08-03-16-Phú Sơn 2 solidarity group, which consists of 5 members. 

This is Dần's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

The main hardship that Dần faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profits, Dần hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase cloth to resell

loans.name: 02 - Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Nguyệt operates a food stall/restaurant selling bread. Nguyệt has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. She is requesting a loan to purchase bread and pork to resell.

Nguyệt is 56 years old, is married, and has 2 children.  She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province.


Nguyệt is the group leader of the 04-11-02-Nam Ngạn solidarity group, which consists of 3 members. 

In 2011, Nguyệt joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Nguyệt has successfully repaid 1 loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Nguyệt faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Nguyệt hopes for her children to find a good job, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase bread and pork to resell

loans.name: 24 Quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Tính lives with two dependents in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province. She is 34 years old and she is married with two children.

She operates a food stall/restaurant selling vegetables. Tính has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.  The main hardship that she faces in her business is the lack of capital.

She is requesting a loan to purchase vegetables to resell.  In 2013, she joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Tính has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She is the group leader of the 03.01.24 - Quảng Hưng solidarity group, which consists of three members. 

With her business profit, Tính hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase vegetable to resell.

loans.name: 08 Phú Sơn 2 Group

texts.en:
Đức is 49 years old and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with two dependents.

Đức operates a food stall/restaurant selling noodles. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Đức faces in her business is the lack of capital.

She is requesting a loan to purchase a table and chair to sell food. In 2013, Đức joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Đức has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She is the group leader of the 08-02-08-Phú Sơn 2 solidarity group, which consists of three members. 

With her business profit, Đức hopes for her children to find a good job, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase a table and chair to sell food.

loans.name: 13-Phú Sơn2 Group

texts.en:
Đức is 34 years old and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with two dependents. 

She has a retail business selling clothes. Đức has been involved in this business for five years. The main hardship that she faces in her business is the lack of capital.

She is requesting a loan to purchase clothes to resell. Đức is the group leader of the 08-03-13-Phú Sơn 2 solidarity group, which consists of six members. In 2013, she joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business.  She has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profit, Đức hopes to build a new house, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to resell.

loans.name: 03-Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hoa has a retail business selling general goods and dry food. She is requesting a loan to purchase general goods and dry food to resell. Hoa is 43 years old and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa City, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with her two dependents.

Hoa is the group leader of the 04-05-03-Nam Ngạn solidarity group, which consists of three members. In 2013, Hoa joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hoa has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

Hoa has been involved in this business for five years. The main hardship that Hoa faces in her business is the lack of capital. With her business profit, Hoa hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase general goods and dry food to resell.

loans.name: Quyên

texts.en:
Mrs. Quyên works in agriculture farming poultry and cattle. Quyên is 50 years old and she is married with one child. Quyên lives with no dependents in district of Hoang Hoa, a rural town in the Thanh Hoa province.

This is Quyên's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Quyên has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Quyên faces in her life is not having a clean water system and hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

In the future, Quyên hopes to build a new house, for her business to do well, and to remodel her house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Feruza

texts.ru: Феруза, 35 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. Все дети школьного и дошкольного возраста. У Ферузы- среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав в 1996 году практически с нуля, благодаря целеустремленности и трудолюбию, Феруза на сегодняшний день имеет: 1 дойную корову и земельный надел 0,45 ГА, дополнительно Феруза арендует 1 ГА земли. Она ежегодно выращивает хлопок, арбузы, помидоры и болгарский перец для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Феруза обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом для закупки минеральных удобрений, семян элитных сортов  и организации полевых работ. После сбора большого урожая, денежные средства Феруза планирует вложить в скот, от реализации которого Феруза сможет получить большую прибыль, что приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита Феруза планирует вложить в постройку нового дома и обучение детей.
texts.en:
Feruza is 35 years old, married and is raising 5 children.  All of her kids are of school age.  Feruza has a high school education and her main source of income is her farming and cattle raising business, which she started in 1996 from scratch.  Thanks to Feruza's persistence and hard work, she currently has a cow and a 0.45 hectares of land.  In addition, Feruza is leasing another hectare-sized plot.  Every year, she grows cotton, watermelon, tomatoes and pepper, for both her family and for sale.  Her monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS).  

In order to expand her business, Feruza turned to the bank of Bai Tushum for a loan to purchase fertilizer, high quality seed and to organize field work.  After a great harvest, Feruza is planning to purchase cattle which she is hoping will bring a lot of income for her and her family.  Profits from her business, Feruza is planning to use for building of a new house and for her children's education.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seed

loans.name: Salvador

texts.es:
Salvador de 72 años de edad, es una persona que se dedica a los oficios de fontanería su mayor  preocupación es el bienestar de su esposa y de su hijo, esto le a convertido en un hombre de trabajo con mayor eficiencia. A lo largo de sus años de vida aprendió dicha profesión a la edad de 30 años cuando un amigo de la comunidad le enseño a desempeñarse en esta área, sus padres que en paz descansen, quienes lo instruyeron en la vida a hacer una persona honesta y con buenos principios, Actualmente Salvador vive con su esposa, ella se dedica a los oficios domésticos de el hogar y a cuidar su hijo. 


Él dedica su tiempo a su trabajo de fontanería en su comunidad,  ya que la junta de directiva de agua  lo eligió para  que   pudiera desempeñarse como fontanero, obteniendo así su trabajo estable, luego los fines de semana dedica su tiempo a sus cultivos y el tiempo libre lo dedica a su descanso juntamente con su esposa.


El  dinero sera utilizado para consumo, gastos personales, para la alimentación de él y de su esposa, para así suplir algunas de las necesidades de su hogar, ya que también tendrá que hacer un gasto en la reparación de su dentadura .  

Los planes a futuro para Salvador son: el y su esposa convivan en un ambiente de tranquilidad de manera que puedan gozar de buena salud.
texts.en:
Salvador is 72 years old and is a plumber. His greatest concern is the well-being of his wife and his son, and this has made him a more efficient  worker. He learned this profession at the age of 30, when a  friend in the community taught him this occupation. His parents, may they rest in peace, taught him to be an honest person with good principles in life. 

Now Salvador lives with his wife, who is a housewife and looks after their son. He devotes his time to his plumbing work in his community, as the board of the water utility hired him as a plumber, and this way he obtained steady work. On weekends he devotes his time to his crops, and in his free time he and his wife like to rest. 

The money will be used for personal use, personal expenses, sustenance for he and his wife, and to furnish some of their household necessities, and he will also have to make an outlay to repair his dentures. Salvador's future plans are for he and his wife to live together an atmosphere of tranquillity so that they can enjoy good health.

loans.use: For personal use, personal expenses and sustenance for he and his wife.

loans.name: Minka

texts.fr: Minka est une femme de 60 ans mariée mère de famille. Elle est commerçante et fait la vente en détail de l'huile de palme dans un quartier de la capitale depuis 02 ans. Elle a une bonne connaissance des fournisseurs, et surtout de sa clientèle qu'elle a acquise au fil du temps grâce à son expérience dans ce domaine. Mais elle se retrouve constamment en rupture de stock parce qu'elle est obligée de faire écouler tous le stock pour pouvoir s'en procurer à nouveau ceci à cause de la petitesse de son capital. Elle souhaiterai augmenter son stock  en achetant en gros des bidons d'huile de palme, ceci augmentera non seulement ses ventes mais aussi son bénéfice. Bénéfice qu'elle réinvestira en partie dans son activité pour l'agrandir et le reste lui permettra de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Minka is 60 years old and a mother. She has been a retailer of palm oil for the past two years. She knows her suppliers well and her clients even better. She has acquired clients over time due to the experience she has in her domain. 

However, she is constantly facing stock shortages. The small size of her capital means that she has to sell all of her stock in order to buy more.

She would like to increase her stock by buying large containers of palm oil. This will help her not only increase her sales, but also her profits. She will partially reinvest her profits into growing her business. She will use the rest to meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: increase her stock of palm oil.

loans.name: Muhabat

texts.ru: Мухабат 32 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Мухабат - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 14 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду, решительности и целеустремленности Мухабат, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 1 теленок,15 овец, а также есть земельный надел размером 0,40 ГА, на котором Мухабат выращивает фасоль и клевер. Она регулярно реализует молоко и молочную продукцию. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). Мухабат входит в группу "Береке Талас", в эту группу входят еще 3 человека, в итоге их четверо. Мухабат является лидером группы. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум"  за кредитом  на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Мухабат планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на обучение детей.
texts.en:
Muhabat is 32 years old, married and together with her husband is raising four children.  Muhabat has a high school education and her main source of income is a livestock and farming business, which she started 14 years ago with a purchase of cattle for 5,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to Muhabat's hard work and persistence, she currently has two cows, one calf, and 15 sheep.  She also has a 0.40 hectare-sized plot of land where she grows beans and clover.  She regularly sells milk and other milk products.  Her monthly income is approximately 10,000 som (KGS).  

Muhabat is also the leader of the "Bereke Talas" group, which has three other people.  In order to expand her business, Muhabat turned to the bank of Bai Tushum for a loan to purchase additional cows for her farm.  Profits from her business, Muhabat is planning to use to increase her herd and for the education of her children.

loans.use: To buy cows

loans.name: Phượng

texts.en:
Phượng operates a food stall/restaurant selling fruit.  Phượng has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Phượng is 34 years old, married, and has 3 children.  She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province.  

This is Phượng's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

The main hardship that Phượng faces in her life is not having clean water system and a hygenic latrine.  She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet, a bathroom, and a water filter system.

With her business profits, Phượng hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to remodel her house, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet, a bathroom, and a water filter system

loans.name: Soth

texts.en:
Soth is a widowed woman responsible for raising three children.  Soth, aged 53, is a hardworking woman who operates a farming business to earn a main source of income to support her daily living costs. With the help of her children, Soth primarily grows rice and tropical trees of cashew nuts, which she sells in the markets every harvest season. She has been doing this work for more than 20 years and earns well for the family. 

By applying for this loan, Soth will be able to buy a set of a solar home panel system to install on the top of the roof of her house, which is located in the off-grid area of the province. After being with Hattha Kaksekar Limited, she can gain access to micro-finance services and solar energy, which she uses to support household appliances such as light, TV and radio, so everyone in her family can work or study at night. 

She expresses her thanks to all lenders in advance.

loans.use: to buy a set of a solar home panel system to install on the top of the roof of her house

loans.name: 05 Đông Hải Group

texts.en:
Lý operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. Lý has been involved in this business for 5 years.

Lý is 45 years old, married, and has 3 children.  Lý lives in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

Lý is the group leader of the 05 Đông Hải solidarity group, which consists of 5 members.  She is requesting a loan to purchase shrimp and fish to resell.  

This is Lý's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

The main hardship that Lý faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profits, Lý hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase shrimp and fish to resell.

loans.name: Sean

texts.en:
Sean is 43 years old, married, and has six children, three of whom are attending school. Being a responsible mother, Sean aims to improve her family's standard of living and give them a better lifestyle, especially their education. Sean has a farming business which is her major source of income, while her husband is engaged in fishing activities to supplement their family’s income.

By applying for this loan. Sean will use it to build a hygienic latrine and septic tank for the sake of her family members and to improve her household sanitation practices. Thanks to the water loan program with a special rate offered by Hattha Kaksekar Limited (HKL), Sean is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions, to safeguard the health of her family, and to protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine and septic tank for the sake of her family members

loans.name: Barchynkul

texts.ru: Барчынкул 53 года,вдова, мать 3 детей. После смерти супруга нужно было воспитывать и ставить на ноги детей и Барчынкул решила взять хозяйство и материальную ответственность в свои руки. У Барчынкул - средне-специальное образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Барчынкул занимается животноводством, стартовав в 1986 году с покупки скота на 5,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Барчынкул, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова и 4 бычка, а также есть земельный надел размером 2,40 ГА, на котором она выращивает картофель, фасоль и многолетние травы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 12,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Барчынкул обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом  на покупку бычков для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Барчынкул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и намерена собрать средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Barchynkul is a widow of 53 years old and a mother of three children.  After the death of her husband, Barchynkul was left on her own to raise their children.  She decided to take control of her household and to take the responsibility for the finances.  Barchynkul has a high school education.  Her family's main source of income is a livestock business which she started in 1986 with a purchase of cattle for 5,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to Barchynkul's hard work, she currently has one cow and four calves.  She also has a 2.4 hectares of land which she uses to grow potatoes, beans and grasses.  Her monthly income is 12,000 som (KGS).

In order to expand her business, Barchynkul turned to the bank of Bai Tushum for a loan to purchase calves.  She is planning to raise the calves and then sell them at a higher price.  Barchynkul is planning to use the profits from her business to increase the headcount of her herd and to save some for the future repair of the house.

loans.use: To buy calves

loans.name: 12  Đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Hoa has a business sewing clothes. She has been involved in this business for 3 years. She is requesting a loan to purchase cloth to sew clothing to sell.  

Hoa is 36 years old, married, and has 2 children.  She lives in Thanh Hoa city, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

Hoa is the group leader of the 01.05.12 Đông Hải solidarity group, which consists of 8 members. 

In 2013, Hoa joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Hoa has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Hoa faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hoa hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase cloth to sew clothing to sell

loans.name: Maksura

texts.ru: Максура 64 года, замужем, мать 4 детей. Все дети взрослые. У Максуры - средне-специальное образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается полеводством и животноводством, в чем она имеет большой опыт, ведь стартовала Максура в далеком 1969 году. Благодаря целеустремленности и трудолюбию Максуры, на сегодняшний день у нее есть: 2 дойные коровы, 3 лошади и 35 овец. Также имеется 4,00 ГА земельной доли, на которой она ежегодно выращивает картофель, перец и клевер для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации.  Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS). Максура является членом группы "Береке Талас", в которую кроме нее входят еще 3 человек. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Максура обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом для закупки коров, часть средств она потратит на покупку овец, а на остальные деньги приобретет минеральные удобрения для улучшения плодородности почвы. Максура намерена увеличить поголовье скота и получить хороший урожай со своего участка, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита Максура планирует направить на лечение  вместе с мужем на курорте.
texts.en:
Maksura is 64 years old, married and a mother of 4 children.  All of her children are grown up.  Maksura has a high school education.  The main source of income for her family is Maksura's livestock and farming business.  Maksura has great experience in this field, since she started this endeavor in 1969.  Thanks to Maksura's persistence and hard work, she currently has two cows, three horses, and 35 sheep.  In addition, she has 4 hectares of land where she grows potatoes, pepper and clover for her own use and for sale.  Her monthly income is approximately 20,000 som (KGS).  Maksura is also a member of a group called "Bereke Talas" which has three other people.

In order to grow her business, Maksura turned to the bank of Bai Tushum for a loan to purchase additional cows, sheep and fertilizer to enrich the soil.  Maksura is determined to increase the headcount of her herd and to get a great harvest from her land.  This will increase the income for her and for her family.  Maksura is planning to use the profits from her business for her husband's medical treatments at a sanatorium.

loans.use: To buy cows, sheep and fertilizer

loans.name: Oscar Isaias

texts.es:
Oscar de 24 años de edad, se dedica a la prestación de servicios de motorista con una moto taxi, él trabaja de lunes a sábado, el joven se creció con sus padres quienes lo educaron y lo apoyaron en sus estudios hasta que se graduó como bachiller general, luego comenzó a trabajar en una unidad de trasporte público, como cobrador de esa unidad, con el paso del tiempo aprendió a conducir motocicleta y luego el dueño de la unidad le asignó una moto taxi para que trabajara independientemente;  luego decidió independizarse y fue cuando conoció a su esposa, con quien son padres de una niña de 4 años,  su esposa se dedica a la prestación de servicios en una comercial y juntos trabajan para dar lo mejor a su hija. 


El préstamo será utilizado en consolidar deudas con una comercial, que le ha proporcionado la mayoría de sus muebles y electrodomésticos, para su hogar de esta manera quedara libre de deudas en la comercial y de esta forma mejoran sus ingresos ya que solamente tendrá una cuota mensual,  y le será mucho más fácil la realización de esta ya que en la comercial tenía que pagar 3 cuotas.


Las metas que él tiene para un futuro son las de pagar su crédito y hacer una nueva solicitud de crédito para tener su propia unidad de trasporte la que le permita mejorar sus ingresos económicos, y apoyar en la formación educativa de su hija, ya que manifiesta que la pequeña sueña con ser una doctora.
texts.en:
Oscar is 24 years old and operates a mototaxi. He works from Monday to Saturday. The young man grew up with his parents, who raised him and helped him with his education until he graduated with a high school diploma. Then he began to work on a bus as a fare collector. Over time, he learned to drive a motorcycle, and then the owner of the unit assigned him a mototaxi so that he could be self-employed. Then he decided to go out on his own, and that was when he met his wife. They are the parents of a four-year-old daughter. His wife works as a store clerk, and together they work to give the best to their daughter. 

The loan will be used to consolidate debts with a store that has provided him with most of his furniture and home appliances, so that his household will be free of debts to the store and they will improve their income. He will only have one monthly payment and it will be much easier to make, as at the store he had to make three installment payments. 

His goals for the future are to pay off the loan and to make a new loan application so that he can have his own mototaxi, which will allow him to improve his income and help with his daughter's education, as he says that the little one dreams of being a doctor.

loans.use: To consolidate his debts with the store that has provided him with most of his furniture and home appliances.

loans.name: Claudine

texts.fr: Claudine est une femme de 39 ans, mère de famille. Elle commerçante et vend  des beignets en matinée depuis 18 mois dans un quartier de la capitale.Son savoir faire dans ce domaine et les prix pratiqués lui ont permis d’acquérir et fidéliser une clientèle qui s'accroît au jour le jour.Ce qui l'amène à vouloir ce crédit parce que son capital ne lui permet plus de satisfaire pleinement sa clientèle.Grâce à lui,elle pourra augmenter son stock en achetant (2 sacs de farine,sucre , un bidon d'huile et le bois de chauffage) .Les bénéfices que lui apportera ce crédit seront en partie réinvesti dans son activité et le reste sera économisé pour la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Claudine is 39 years old and a mother. For the past 18 months, she has been selling beignets in the morning in a neighborhood in the capital. 

Her knowledge in this domain and her prices have allowed her to acquire a loyal clientele that has grown over time. She is asking for a loan as her capital no longer allows her to fully satisfy her clientele. With her loan, she would like to increase her stock by buying two sacks of flour, sugar, a container of oil, and firewood. 

Some of the profits from her loan will be reinvested in her business. The rest will be saved for her children's schooling.

loans.use: buy food staples (flour, sugar, oil, beans)

loans.name: Batdelger

texts.en: Batdelger, 53 years old, lives with his wife and son in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. He has been rendering taxi service to local people since 2010. His wife is a bookkeeper who works for an agricultural company. Using his previous loan, he has completed his house but due to heavy snowfalls during winter, his house is now experiencing heat loss. So he is requesting a loan of 3,000 USD to buy vacuum insulated windows, hardwood floors, and a steel door. After installing vacuum insulated windows and hardwood floors, his family will use less coal for heating and then release less pollutants into air.

loans.use: to buy vacuum insulated windows, hardwood floors, and a steel door

loans.name: Erick Alexander

texts.es: Erick tiene 26 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus 4 hijos de 14 años, 11 años, 7 años y 6 años de edad. Erick se dedica a la comercialización de ropa de forma ambulante. Tiene 8 años de dedicarse a este  negocio por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día prefieren más su productos. Con el fin de aumentar sus ventas e ingresos a tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de variedad de prendas de vestir como: blusas, pantalones, camisas, faldas, etc. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder proceder a la compra de un mayor inventario con el cual espera lograr su objetivo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en:
Erick is 26 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and their four children, ages 14, 11, 7 and 6. Erick sells clothing as a street vendor. He has  been working in this business for eight years, so he already has many customers who each day prefer his products. 

With the aim of increasing his sales and revenues, he has taken the decision to request a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of a variety of clothing, such as blouses, pants, shirts, skirts, etc. He hopes to be able to have this loan, and be able to proceed with the purchase of a larger inventory. With this, he hopes to achieve his objective of improving his living conditions and those of his family.

loans.use: To buy blouses, pants, shirts, skirts, etc. for his business.

loans.name: Mahfuza

texts.en:
Mahfuza is a young successful lady. She is 23 years old, married, and has one child. Her husband is a migrant.
